attributes.comment:
I am asking that you please do not raise your filing fees! We are in the middle of
a foreign adoption. The number of fees that we have to pay are astronomical and
we really need you to keep yours down. It is such a blessing to be able to adopt
a child from a different country. One that would never have a home otherwise.
Never know what it is like to have a family. We are so excited to have this
opportunity. If you raise the fees, you make it that much harder for families to
participate in this wonderful gift of adoption. PLEASE do not raise your fees!!
Thank you.

Jennifer Doughty
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jennifer Doughty
